exceptions.tactic: intros p q H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6.
apply prop4 in H6 as [H7 H8].

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros p q H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6. apply prop4 in H6 as [H7 H8]. apply is_sqr_mult in H7. apply is_sqr_mult in H8. split. - apply H7. - split; [apply H8 | ]. apply sqr_prime1 with (b := q). + apply Zdivide_intro with (q := p). * ring_simplify. reflexivity. + apply prime_intro; auto.
